page.title: 13THE VICAR OF EDGEWORTH.
page.content: The vicar has been in this area for{15 {years.}He was appointed to the parish of Oakridge,which includes Waterlane, but now has charge of{Bisley,Oakridge, {Miserden and Edgeworth parishes.}He {has }help with Miserden & Edgeworth parishes from a retired vicar who lives in Miserden.The large area means more responsibilities,more meetings & more travel for him.He helps all kinds of people with all sorts of problems. {He is chairman of the Parish Council. 18 people regularly attend the Sunday morning Edgeworth Church service.The vicar takes this Communion every 3rd week.There is a joint service with the Methodists every month in which he participates.There is no parish news letter,which the vicar regrets.He very much enjoys his work,and is delighted that,against the national trend,his congregations are increasing.
